Actions.Name: When an item reaches end of its retention period
Actions.Description: Triggers when a SharePoint, OneDrive or Exchange item (which has a retention label applied to it ) reaches the end of its established retention period. When using this trigger, the retention label configuration must be set to trigger this action at the end of the period as well.
